metadata.dc:author: Jiménez Echevarría, A
Trujillo Armas, R
García Medina, A
García Nieto, V
Viejo Rivero, E
Zurita Molina, A
metadata.dc:description: Description a new case--the most precociously diagnosed in medical literature--of Xanthinuria, with the peculiarity of having débuted with cerebral haemorraging without lithiasis at any time. Metabolism of purines, characteristics of the disease in general and of the case concerned, and published cases are reviewed.
metadata.dc:title: Xantinuria. Nueva aportación. Revisión de la literatura.
[Xanthinuria. New Report. Review of the literature].
